select a.*,b.user_name,b.user_account from drive_examsubscribe as a inner join drive_user as b on a.fk_user_id = b.id where a.is_deleted = 0 AND b.is_deleted = 0
and b.user_name LIKE concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and b.user_account LIKE concat('%',#{userAccount},'%')
order by a.gmt_create desc
